modName: MEGA PACK - MUSIC SOUNDS and EFFECTS - for SKYRIM 3v0
summary: better music, sounds in interface and, water, rain, thunder and more....
descriptionHtml:
Please endorse if you like it :)

[youtube]b3fT2ug3pT0[/youtube] 

NEW ERA Iron Weapons ------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28059
HD skill interface -------------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27980
[check to my nev mod for caves (textures) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768
(mod for dungeons (textures)------------------ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25910
(recoloured dialogue menu)-------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27704
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The new package includes everything, of course, the earlier version of my mod, also chose the best of sounds, and the effect is great :)


mod contains music and sounds in a very high quality ..
 even listen to good stereo should have a well-cast enter the atmosphere I wanted to play these modifications.

ALL MY MODS WORKS ANY VERSIONS THIS GAME [Dawnguard to) BECAUSE NO USES (ESP, ESM and BSA FILE) SOUNDS AND MUSIC GAME REPLACES AUTOMATICALY...

 All songs and sounds are adapted to the system currently does from stereo to 7.1!

90% of mod music I composed myself, and the rest are songs that are in the files of my game: applying from other games, and more-such as the Robin Hood or Beny Hill)

 Sounds interface \"composed\" the same version 1.5 and 2.0 of course, also have them here :)

Since one of the authors responsible for the modification of weather effects of rain and thunder sounds found with whom I used are the property of my version 2.0 has been temporarily disabled ... In of this I decided to take care of the basics and the effects of this modification (ver 3v0) already has them ...

link to the sites of this modification - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26092

MODIFICATION CONTAINS

[90% of the musical pieces nad 100% sounds interface was composed by myself :)]

MUSIC for all kinds of locations and the music played during the fighting
(combat, dread, dungeon, explore, special, tavern, town, castles)

SOUNDS effects This time, it\'s really a lot ......here is a list.
- New sounds of singing birds.
- New sounds of rain.
- New sounds of thunder.
- New sounds of wind (in the dungeons, caves and outside)
- New user interface sounds.
- New environmental effects for the caves, catacombs, dungeons, and Dwemer ruins.

New sounds of singing birds.
Turning the modification of about 35 - 40% of the sounds of birds in the game on a more realistic and high quality!
 The sounds of birds have been recorded in the Polish forests (Bieszczady) by my good friend who is a forester;)

New sounds of rain - New sounds of thunder.
Now all kinds of rain not have their own repetitive soundtrack ..
Light rain - in the small creatures that always arouses the desire to escape, therefore, should be able to hear how we communicate with each other - now how are you listen to it will be heard (in low rainfall)
Average rain - usually is not very diverse, and what was hidden already done - so the rain can be heard, but not any longer even silent cries of animals, even the smallest ...
In the case of very - Heavy rain - I decided quite clearly differentiate the rain, because that\'s what happens in nature. The sound is now more \"wave\" Listen, the harder it rains again and after a while a little less like ...
When it comes to thunder Beside decided to add the same lightning type effects, lightning hit a tree, or odgl?os weak rain or wind. Along with the rain soundtrack gives us the type of effect - stronger rain during a lightning strike, or slightly stronger wind. (of course, these effects are not very clearly audible, so as not to spoil the real experience) 

 New sounds of wind.
Wind noises are now more suited to the environment in which you are currently located.

New user interface sounds.
Version 1.5, 2.0 and 3.0 has the same interface sounds (modification replaces the boring original sounds more friendly to the ear)

 New environmental effects.
From now on, you can hear it in the catacombs howling and moaning undead, more distinct and frightening sounds of chains and innech Items.
In the caves, dwemers ruins and mines have been changed a few sounds of Environmental and several effects wind blows, falling stones, etc. ..

DEMOS MUSICS

**** LINKS TO LISTENING **** (my project for skyrim music)

BATTLE 6 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/9XoJq8WexXt/battle_5_for_music_of_skyrim

battle 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/1O3oObtTlDt/mus_combat_1._muzyka_bitewna_do_skyrim

battle 4 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/7sFu1LieQht/music_battle_2_for_skyrim

tavern music 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/2jM8Lf3RAFR/music_for_tavern_of_scyrim_part_1

castle imperial 2 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/7hCDjpOqTfJ/mus_castle_imperial_2._muzyka_do_zamku_w_grze_skyrim_opc.2

fort - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/5aJqOZKM7QD/mus_dungeon_fort_muzyka_do_fortow_w_skyrim

town day - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/522ZI2Euz35/mus_town_day_muzyka_tla_do_miast_w_skyrim

castle imperial 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/27ONuRM2oqv/mus_castle_imperial_1_muzyka_do_zamku_skyrim

(here not all my projecy this mod ofc.) Have fun;)

RECOMMENDED MOD -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24630 (MORE Additional Player Voices for Skyrim )
